org.jpedal.examples.viewer

Class MultiViewer

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jpedal.examples.viewer.Viewer
      • org.jpedal.examples.viewer.MultiViewer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ViewerInt

    public class MultiViewer
extends Viewer

    Multi View PDF Viewer

    Enhance the PDF Viewer with the ability to include multiple windows for opening more than 1 PDF

    Run directly from jar with java -cp jpedal.jar org/jpedal/examples/viewer/MultiViewer

    See Our Swing Viewer Example Code

      MultiViewer()

      MultiViewer(int modeOfOperation)
      setup and run client passing in paramter to show if running as applet, webstart or JSP (only applet has any effect at present)
